title: Emerald & Tanzanite Blossom Jhumka - A Fusion of Tradition and Modernity
materials: Rose Quartz beads (estimated 7.29 carats total) and accent Diamonds (estimated 1.11 carats total).
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Jhumka silhouette. Features vibrant Emeralds as the central stones, framed by delicate diamond detailing. Tanzanite cabochons add a touch of blue and Rose Quartz beads complete the design. The setting exhibits exquisite detailing with micro-pave diamond accents, offering exceptional sparkle and a luxurious feel. The design showcases a unique blend of gemstone cuts and colors for a modern, artistic look.
occasions: and special celebrations. A statement piece to elevate any modern outfit
also suitable for formal family events.
description: A dazzling blend of classic Jhumka style with a contemporary gemstone palette. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, these earrings showcase high-quality Emeralds, Tanzanite, and Diamonds. The unique color combination and modern design make this a truly unique and investment-worthy piece.
